sentences.en: Angela says she longs to join an amateur dramatics class.
sentences.cn: 安杰拉说她渴望参加业余戏剧班。

sentences.en: Bob hurried to join him, and they rode home together.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃匆忙赶去和他会合，然后两人一起开车回家。

sentences.en: Church leaders have joined the campaign to end foxhunting.
sentences.cn: 教会领袖参与了禁止猎狐的运动。

sentences.en: De Gaulle vetoed Britain's application to join the EEC.
sentences.cn: 戴高乐驳回了英国加入欧洲经济共同体的申请。

sentences.en: He got permission from his commanding officer to join me.
sentences.cn: 他得到指挥官的许可来与我会合。

sentences.en: I decided to join the army.
sentences.cn: 我决定去参军。

sentences.en: I know you will join me in wishing them Godspeed.
sentences.cn: 我知道你会同我一起祝愿他们诸事顺遂的。

sentences.en: I'd like nothing better than to join you girls.
sentences.cn: 我最喜欢和你们女孩子在一起了。

sentences.en: It was punk that first moved him to join a band seriously.
sentences.cn: 最初是朋克摇滚乐促使他正式加入了乐队。

sentences.en: Join the two pieces of wood with strong glue.
sentences.cn: 用强力胶水把两块木头黏合起来。

sentences.en: Make sure you join the queue inside the bank.
sentences.cn: 在银行里一定要排队。

sentences.en: Many sacrificed their weekend to join the hunt for the missing girl.
sentences.cn: 许多人牺牲周末时间，加入了寻找失踪女孩的行动。

sentences.en: Roll up, roll up, come and join The Greatest Show on Earth.
sentences.cn: 快来呀，快来呀，来一起看“地球上最精彩的演出”。

sentences.en: the benefits of joining our pension scheme
sentences.cn: 参加我们的退休金计划的好处

sentences.en: The lads don't join the union because they're frightened of being victimized.
sentences.cn: 那几个伙计没加入工会是因为害怕成为牺牲品。

sentences.en: There are any amount of clubs you could join.
sentences.cn: 有无数个俱乐部你可以加入。

sentences.en: They can steal away at night and join us.
sentences.cn: 他们可以晚上偷偷溜出来和我们碰面。

sentences.en: They cannot join forces to vote her out of office.
sentences.cn: 他们不能联合起来通过投票表决让她下台。

sentences.en: When assembling the pie, wet the edges where the two crusts join.
sentences.cn: 捏合馅饼时，要弄湿两张饼皮粘连的地方。

sentences.en: When did you join the Labour Party?
sentences.cn: 你何时加入工党的？

sentences.en: You can enjoy a sport without joining a club or belonging to a team.
sentences.cn: 不加盟俱乐部或球队也可以享受体育运动的乐趣。

sentences.en: You will join us at our table, won't you?
sentences.cn: 你会过来和我们一起吃，对吗？

words.tran_cn: 有接缝的；有节的，有关节的
接洽人；接合物；刨接缝的长刨
寡妇所得遗产；（丈夫生前指定的）由妻子继承的遗产；连接
连接，贴合（joint的过去式和过去分词形式）

phrases.tran_cn: v. 使（车辆等）连接上；跟随

trans.tran_en: a place where two parts of an object are connected or fastened together
to become a member of an organization, society, or group

trans.tran_cn: 加入…之中，加入，参与，连接，会合，上（车等）
trans.tran_en: to begin to take part in an activity that other people are involved in
